name: Auto Tab Discard
description: Increase browser speed and reduce memory load and when you have numerous open tabs.

name: LeechBlock NG
description: LeechBlock NG is a simple productivity tool designed to block those time-wasting sites that can suck the life out of your working day. All you need to do is specify which sites to block and when to block them.

name: Block Site
description: A customizable, password-protected website blocker and redirector.

name: YouTube MP4 Downloader
description: View and Download YouTube videos in raw MP4 format. Get notifications about available videos and formats.

name: CyberGhost VPN Free Proxy
description: Use CyberGhost Proxy Plugin to encrypt your browser traffic so you can be sure that no online snooper can see where you go on the web.

name: KeePassXC-Browser
description: Official browser plugin for the KeePassXC password manager (https://keepassxc.org).

name: Undo Close Tab
description: Allows you to restore the tab you just closed with a single click—plus it can offer a list of recently closed tabs within a convenient context menu.

name: WebRTC Leak Shield
description: Disable WebRTC and prevent IP leak.

name: Lilo - Home Page
description: Lilo homepage is displayed when a new tab is open.Lilo homepage displays a News Feed that you can set to your favorite socially and eco-friendly editors. It also allows starting your searches via Lilo.

name: Text Link
description: Allows URI texts written in webpages to be loaded by double clicks.

name: Momentum
description: Replace your new tab page with a personal dashboard featuring to-do, weather, daily inspiration and more!

name: Vimium-FF
description: The Hacker's Browser. Vimium provides keyboard shortcuts for navigation and control in the spirit of Vim.This is a port of the popular Chrome extension to Firefox.Most stuff works, but the port to Firefox remains a work in progress.

name: Pinned WhatsApp Web
description: Go to the pinned WhatsApp Web tab. If it doesn't exist, it's created.WhatsApp doesn’t endorse or sponsor this project.

name: Media Converter and Muxer - Audio Tools
description: Easy to use video and audio converter and muxer written in WebExtension built on top of the well-known FFmpeg converter

name: Measure-it
description: Draw a ruler across any webpage to check the width, height, or alignment of page elements in pixels.

name: Zoom Page WE
description: Zoom web pages (either per-site or per-tab) using full-page zoom, text-only zoom and minimum font size. Fit-to-width zooming can be applied to pages automatically. Fit-to-window scaling  can be applied to small images.

name: Exhentai Passport
description: Help you access to exhentai.org.

name: AdNauseam
description: Blocking ads and fighting back against advertising surveillance.

name: Old Reddit Redirect
description: Ensure Reddit always loads the old design

name: SearchPreview
description: SearchPreview enhances your search results pages by inserting site preview images (thumbnails) and popularity ranks into Google™, DuckDuckGo™, Yahoo™ and Bing™ search results.

name: Easy Video Downloader (Flash and Video)
description: A video and audio downloader (grabber) that works with both internal and external download managers like IDM or Wget

name: Disable JavaScript
description: Adds the ability to disable JavaScript for specific sites or specific tabs.You can customize the default JS state (on or off), the disable behavior (by domain or by tab) and much more.

name: Exif Viewer
description: Displays the Exif and IPTC data in local and remote JPEG images.

name: Private Video Downloader
description: Download videos from web sites and avoid compromising entries in your browser history.

name: Mp3 Downloader for SoundCloud™
description: Add download link to all SoundClould tracks

name: Nano Defender for Firefox
description: Companion extension for Nano Adblocker

name: Lilo
description: Search with Lilo to finance social and environmental projects. Use the optionnal Lilo's home page to follow social and environmental news (change your newtab and startup page to Lilo). Finance social and environmental projects when buying on the web

name: RESTED
description: A REST client for the rest of us

name: YouTube™ Downloader Lite
description: A very lite YouTube downloader (FLV, WebM, 3GP, and MP4)

name: Empty Cache Button
description: Cache clearing made easy. One click.

name: JavaScript Toggle On and Off (WebExtension)
description: Toggle JavaScript engine on and off the easy way

name: Save Page WE
description: Save a complete web page (as currently displayed) as a single HTML file that can be opened in any browser. Save a single page, multiple selected pages or a list of page URLs. Automate saving from command line.

name: Blur
description: Protect your Passwords, Payments, and Privacy.

name: Flash-HTML5 Player for YouTube™
description: Play YouTube™ Videos in Flash or HTML5 Player

name: Default Bookmark Folder
description: Allows you to choose the default bookmark location folder and quickly bookmark pages via a dedicated icon.

name: Snap Links Plus
description: Select a number of links with a rectangle and open them in new tabs.  You can also lasso checkboxes to quickly check or uncheck them.  Works with radio buttons as well.

name: Tab Mix - Links
description: Tab browsing with an added boost.

name: Clippings
description: Save frequently-entered text for pasting later.

name: CanvasBlocker
description: Alters some JS APIs to prevent fingerprinting.

name: Public Fox
description: Block downloads, lock down bookmarks/addons/downloads with a password.

name: GoodTwitter
description: Forces your browser to use old twitter.

name: Video Background Play Fix
description: Some sites may not work with Firefox for Android video background play feature. This add-on provides a quick fix by blocking the Page Visibility API and the Fullscreen API.

name: Search
description: Search any goods by image on Aliexpress

name: WebSocket Sniffer
description: Sniff websocket frames

name: uberAgent
description: Enables uberAgent to collect web app usage and performance data (e.g., foreground tab, page load duration) from Firefox.

name: SeoQuake SEO extension
description: Accelerate your SEO efforts on the fly. SEOquake is a free plugin for browsers that provides you with key SEO metrics for a specific page, along with other useful tools such as SEO Audit and many others.
